Name: Media Picker Field
AntiForgery: enabled
Author: Sébastien Ros
Website: http://mediapickerfield.codeplex.com
Version: 1.2
OrchardVersion: 1.1
Tags: media, field
Description: Adds a new field to select a file using the Media Picker dialog
Features:
    Contrib.MediaPickerField:
        Description: Adds a new field to select a file using the Media Picker dialog
        Dependencies: Orchard.MediaPicker
        Category: Media
